short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to get shareable link in coursera

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple and convenient Chrome extension designed to help users quickly get shareable links for their Coursera assignments.

How to use:
- Go to the page of the assignment that you have done
- Reload the page
